snippet: Decades after the demise of Fluxus, it is now in the spotlight with several shows, including one at the Zimmerli Art Museum.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit at/around/beyond: Fluxus at Rutgers University at the Jane Voorhees Zimmerli Art Museum in New Brunswick; exhibit commemorates 50th anniversary of now defunct art group.
lead_paragraph: Decades after the demise of Fluxus, it is now in the spotlight with several shows, including one at the Zimmerli Art Museum.

headline.seo: Celebrating Fluxus, a Movement That Didn’t Create by the Rules — Review
headline.main: Celebrating Fluxus, a Movement That Didn’t Create by the Rules
